Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery vessel, the exterior is grooved, covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of six lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394742) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394742)
